name: Chaos Groove
description:
SKITROW STUDIOZ presents a new indie fighting game called "Chaos Groove". In this game, you get classic fast-paced, over-the-top fighting action, featured with upgraded HD 2D Sprites, online play (RollBack Netcode), ground-breaking effects, and a dynamic system that earns points for unlockable goodies. Fight like a hero, play like a legend!

The game will included the following:
Arcade Mode
Vs Mode (Player vs Player, Player vs CPU, CPU vs CPU)
Training Mode
Online (RollBack)
Shop (WIP) Buy items with in-game points! Went ahead and added it in so players can visually see how the shop will look and operate, while in Early Access.
